Damage: 5D '''Capsule''': : Designed by Seinar Fleet Systems concurrently with the Guardian, the 344-class has very similar performance characteristics. Aside from cosmetic differences, the primary differences between the more common Guardian and the 344-class are the lower crew requirements of the 344 (which is a benefit for understaffed system forces, but a liability on long patrols when the crew tend to get worn down), the craft's ability to carry a complement of troops, the slower hyperdrive, less cargo space, and better maneuverability.
